definition: A cadastral survey plan or dataset that has been prepared under the Land Transfer Act and has had new titles created.
Land Transfer Plan is a plan prepared under the Land Transfer Act but has not yet had new titles created.
An LT Unit Plan is a plan prepared under the Unit Titles Act showing show the location of the units, auxiliary units and common areas.
A Survey Office Plan is prepared for surveys of land held under Crown ownership
A Māori Land Plan is prepared for the sudivision or partition of Māori land
Types of surveys included for historical purposes. Not to be used for new surveys.
